name: Assasinator
description:
This game has been submitted for Mini Jam 97:Simulation.

You play as an assassin hired to take out targets (in red) using poison rounds.

Take care not to hit innocent bystanders (white). An dead bystander will cause nearby bystanders to panic. Panicking bystanders have a chance to cause other nearby bystanders to panic in a contagion effect. The panic effect also spreads to red targets making them harder to take out.

Persons hit with poison rounds will start to walk around in a daze. They will die faster when they are moving.

Credit:

Awesome gun sounds: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/sound-effects-search.php?q=suppressed
